## Open-Core Checklist

Qusto uses an open-core model. Please confirm:

- [ ] This change is appropriate for the open-source core (not premium features)
- [ ] I understand this contribution will be **AGPLv3 licensed**
- [ ] If this adds/modifies APIs that premium features might use, I'm willing to sign a CLA

### Does this PR touch any of the following?

- [ ] API endpoints (new or modified)
- [ ] Database schema
- [ ] Core event processing logic
- [ ] Authentication/authorization

*If you checked any of the above, a CLA may be required. We'll let you know.*
